charaepi_ch0127_00_mikuri/2301_1101_0100:
One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] was
finishing up a Pokémon battle when [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ]
heard Wallace call out to [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ].
charaepi_ch0127_00_mikuri/2301_1201_0200:
Hello there, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
That was quite a battle!
charaepi_ch0127_00_mikuri/2301_0401_0400:
You and your Pokémon looked so magnificent on
the battlefield, I couldn’t help but come and pay
you a compliment.
charaepi_ch0127_00_mikuri/2301_0402_0600:
Yes, I can tell! You and your Pokémon looked so
magnificent on the battlefield, I couldn’t help but
come and pay you a compliment.
charaepi_ch0127_00_mikuri/2301_1201_0700:
And having a gorgeous backdrop like Pasio only
serves to highlight your magnificence. It really
makes the perfect stage, doesn’t it?
charaepi_ch0127_00_mikuri/2301_1201_0800:
Speaking of which, if you ever have the
opportunity to visit Sootopolis City in the Hoenn
region, you should definitely make the trip.
charaepi_ch0127_00_mikuri/2301_1201_0900:
My Pokémon Gym is located there. It’s just as
gorgeous as Pasio, if you ask me, only in a
different sort of way.
charaepi_ch0127_00_mikuri/2301_0401_1100:
Yes! People often refer to it as “the mystical city
where history slumbers,” thanks to its traditional
sort of beauty.
charaepi_ch0127_00_mikuri/2301_0402_1300:
Well, people often refer to Sootopolis City as
“the mystical city where history slumbers,”
thanks to its traditional sort of beauty.
charaepi_ch0127_00_mikuri/2301_1201_1400:
It was built inside a crater and is protected by
the crater’s mountainous walls.
charaepi_ch0127_00_mikuri/2301_1201_1500:
Its majestic waves push back any evildoers
who would try to invade the city by sea.
charaepi_ch0127_00_mikuri/2301_1201_1600:
With the mystical city streets of Sootopolis as your
battle stage, I bet you and your Pokémon could
shine in an entirely new light!
charaepi_ch0127_00_mikuri/2301_1201_1700:
You’ve already shown yourselves to be a work of
art here on Pasio. If you hone your abilities in
Sootopolis, the sky is the limit!
charaepi_ch0127_00_mikuri/2301_0401_1900: Hmm... You really don’t see it, do you?
charaepi_ch0127_00_mikuri/2301_0302_2000:
I feel like that’s an
exaggeration...
charaepi_ch0127_00_mikuri/2301_0402_2100:
Oh, not at all! You are a work of art, even if
you don’t see it yourself.
charaepi_ch0127_00_mikuri/2301_1201_2200:
Maybe I can show you what I mean rather than
try to explain it in words.
charaepi_ch0127_00_mikuri/2301_1201_2300: Yes! Milotic, could you lend me a hand?
charaepi_ch0127_00_mikuri/2301_1201_2400:
Let’s present [Name:PlayerNickname ] with one
of our aquatic illusions!
charaepi_ch0127_00_mikuri/2301_1201_2600: Were you bedazzled by our performance?
charaepi_ch0127_00_mikuri/2301_0401_2800:
Ahh, yes. We do tend to have that effect on
people! I had a feeling you would understand!
charaepi_ch0127_00_mikuri/2301_0402_3000:
Wasn’t it?! I’m so glad you think so. I had a
feeling you would understand!
charaepi_ch0127_00_mikuri/2301_1201_3100:
You see, Pokémon that have trained to their
utmost limits have the power to amaze audiences
big and small.
charaepi_ch0127_00_mikuri/2301_1201_3200:
If that’s not worthy of being called a work of art,
I don’t know what is!
charaepi_ch0127_00_mikuri/2301_1101_3300:
Of course, in order to achieve such works of art,
we Trainers have to work just as hard as our
Pokémon partners.
charaepi_ch0127_00_mikuri/2301_1201_3400:
That’s why you and your partner make such a
brilliant sync pair, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0127_00_mikuri/2301_1201_3600:
I would even go so far as to call you our equals
when it comes to performing as a combo!
charaepi_ch0127_00_mikuri/2301_1201_4000:
Yes, I’m so glad I was able to cross paths with
a sync pair like you. So very glad!
charaepi_ch0127_00_mikuri/2301_1201_4100: Coming to Pasio was definitely the right decision.
charaepi_ch0127_00_mikuri/2301_1201_4200:
Milotic and I came here with one goal:
to become the greatest sync pair of all.
charaepi_ch0127_00_mikuri/2301_1201_4300:
I want to dominate at the PML... I want to feel
the beautiful glory of that moment, as I take the
title of champion!
charaepi_ch0127_00_mikuri/2301_1201_4400:
If the two of us team up together and fight for
that honor, I know it’s within our grasp.
charaepi_ch0127_00_mikuri/2301_1201_4500:
Now then... I think it’s time Milotic and I were
on our way.
charaepi_ch0127_00_mikuri/2301_0401_4700:
Just off to study all of the beautiful things the
world has to offer.
charaepi_ch0127_00_mikuri/2301_0402_4900:
We’re just off to study all of the beautiful things
the world has to offer.
charaepi_ch0127_00_mikuri/2301_1201_5000: You know, that sort of thing.
